description: The round payoff this round was 103. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 51.5.
Mutual cooperation through choosing Option 1 leads to an equal and relatively high payoff for both players.
John has shown a willingness to cooperate in at least one instance, which could influence future decisions.
The game structure incentivizes coordination, as deviating to Option 2 when the other player chooses Option 1 results in a lower payoff than mutual Option 1 selection.
